entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h gust 33 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Ice pellets early in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
